mapper.insert: INSERT INTO US_EMAIL_VERIFICATION (EMAIL, VERIFYING_CODE, VERIFYING_STATUS_CODE, VERIFYING_EXPIRE_DATETIME, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_USER, EDIT_DATETIME, EDIT_USER) VALUES (#{email}, #{verificationCode}, #{statusCode}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE), NOW(), #{insertId}, NOW(), #{insertId})
mapper.update: UPDATE US_EMAIL_VERIFICATION SET VERIFYING_CODE = #{verificationCode}, VERIFYING_STATUS_CODE = #{statusCode}, VERIFYING_EXPIRE_DATETIME = DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE), EDIT_DATETIME = NOW(), EDIT_USER = #{updateId} WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL AS email, VERIFYING_CODE AS verifyingCode, VERIFYING_STATUS_CODE AS verifyingStatusCode, VERIFYING_EXPIRE_DATETIME AS verifyingExpireDatetime FROM US_EMAIL_VERIFICATION WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
